Job Description: Job description     Key Responsibilities     Developing new features like wallet etc.    Decreasing the time spent fixing and maintaining already shipped features.    Improving the infrastructure which can handle a large number of clients.    Analyzing and improving efficiency, scalability, and stability of monitoring, continuous integration, and platform integration.    Advanced and aware of new technologies and architectures, and share them with the team and implement them into present software engineering process.      Preferred Experience     Should have 5-7 years of experience in backend with a Bachelor s/Masters degree in Computer Science, Maths or related technical domain.    Must have led a technical project from specification to delivery.    Ability to code in a backend language (Ruby on Rails or Python or node.js or Go or Php or Java).    Have knowledge/experience with AWS or GCP cloud providers.    Have experience in delivering products with micro-services architecture, micro-services over Amazon Web Services,    An expert in implementing best practices for the full software development life cycle, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations.      Required Skills      software developmet, SD 3
